description:
<U+2060>scale_*_gradient<U+2060> creates a two colour gradient (low-high),
<U+2060>scale_*_gradient2<U+2060> creates a diverging colour gradient (low-mid-high),
<U+2060>scale_*_gradientn<U+2060> creates a n-colour gradient. For binned variants of
these scales, see the color steps scales.
example_call: scale_colour_gradientn(name = waiver(), ..., colours, values = NULL, space = "Lab",
